lead_paragraph: Manuel Pellegrini has cause to feel resentment at being handed his notice by Manchester City, even though the mild-mannered Chilean isn't showing it.

headline.print_headline: Popular Pellegrini Begins Long Farewell at Manchester City
headline.main: Popular Pellegrini Begins Long Farewell at Manchester City

snippet: Manuel Pellegrini has cause to feel resentment at being handed his notice by Manchester City, even though the mild-mannered Chilean isn't showing it....
